  • Method Details

    • create

      public static Robot create​(int figure, Player player)
      method creates a robot from given figure ID.
      Parameters:
      figure - figure ID of the wanted robot, from 0 to 5.
      Returns:
      Robot associated with given ID.

    • move

      public void move​(Orientation direction)
      Moves the robot in given direction. It is not checked if the move is allowed. 
       move(UP) moves the robot 1 field up (i.e. y-1 ).
 move(LEFT) moves the robot 1 field to the Left (i.e. x-1 ).
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction of the movement

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(Coordinate pos)

    • rotate

      public void rotate​(Rotation rotation)
      Rotates the robots orientation by 90°.
      Parameters:
      rotation - Direction to rotate. Either LEFT or RIGHT.

    • rotateTo

      public void rotateTo​(Orientation rotateTo)
